18.eng-name: The Book of the Fear Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin 'Abdullah that:The Prophet (ﷺ) led a group of his companions in praying two rak'ahs, then he said the taslim, then he led some others in praying two rak'ahs, then he said the taslim

chapter.eng-name: The narrations mentioned for the Fear Prayer
